name: Kyle Springfield
about: Data and AI engineer building reliable analytics systems across SQL, Python, dbt, Snowflake, and AWS with a focus on experimentation and decision-ready execution.
highlights: Build and automate reliable AWS/Snowflake data pipelines with SQL, Python, and dbt; enforce version control, testing, and reproducible workflows.
Apply statistical analysis and experimentation to uncover trends, measure lift, and strengthen data storytelling and metric design.
Leverage Gen AI tools to speed up exploration, automate routine analyses, and improve documentation.
Synthesize large, noisy datasets to uncover customer patterns, segment opportunities, and inform product and marketing strategy.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Information Technology

experience.title: Business Analyst III
highlights: Build and ship Tableau dashboards and self-serve metrics for Global Sales Enablement; transform training and survey data from Snowflake into decision-ready insights for leaders.
Partner with PMs and Sales Directors to prioritize analytics, define KPIs, and surface adoption/impact trends that inform enablement strategy, content, and field rollout.

experience.title: Data Engineer
highlights: Delivered high-quality, efficient data solutions and reporting to support Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services in detecting and preventing fraud, waste, and abuse within government-sponsored health programs.
Architect and maintain AWS data pipelines with Python, SQL, and Bash; ingesting, reconciling, and validating multi-source data from CMS and partner vendor systems.
Enable downstream analytics by curating clean datasets and metrics used in investigations of suspicious provider/claims patterns.

experience.title: Python Developer
highlights: Created and optimized data pipelines and workflows, leveraging Python, SQL, Gen AI, TypeScript, and AWS to deliver actionable business insights for various clients.
Delivered lightweight React apps and Tableau dashboards that turned complex datasets into clear, decision-ready visuals used by leadership.
Automated client reporting with parameterized Python jobs and validation checks (schema, nulls, anomaly flags), lifting accuracy and trust in metrics.

experience.title: Data Engineer
highlights: Refactored and modularized Python libraries used by marketing-science models, cutting training/scoring run time in half and raising model accuracy; enforced unit tests and Git-based code review for team-wide reuse.
Automated campaign analysis/reporting via Python, SQL, Tableau templates, and scheduled runs, eliminating significant manual effort and standardizing KPIs across stakeholders.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
highlights: Developed Python scripts for automation and data models within Jupyter Notebooks, streamlining digital campaign measurement workflows to significantly enhance operational efficiency.
Applied machine learning to custom data models in Python and SQL, enhancing predictive analytics and campaign performance evaluations.

experience.title: Marketing Data Scientist
highlights: Spearheaded the development of self-service automation by creating Python scripts integrated with Jira to streamline processes, resulting in significant enhancements in efficiency and task management.
Developed tailored Tableau dashboards for top clients, managing brand sales data sources to deliver detailed insights that supported strategic decision-making.

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Transformed post-campaign data into actionable insights using Python, SQL, and Tableau, enabling enhanced strategic decisions and better client outcomes.
Developed advanced Python ETL scripts for data visualization and market trend analysis, leading to improved strategic decision-making.

experience.title: Risk & Performance Analytics Specialist
highlights: Designed and implemented comprehensive risk and performance dashboards in Tableau, reducing report generation time by over 50% for senior management.
Collaborated with global teams to standardize and automate reporting processes using Business Objects and VBA, ensuring consistent and reliable data delivery.

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Collaborated with Support Account Managers and sales teams on top enterprise customer accounts to provide accurate and timely customer-facing reports.
Created custom Oracle BI reports and dashboards to extract data, analyze results using statistical techniques, and provide weekly and monthly reporting.

certifications: Certified AI Engineer for Developers Associate - DataCamp
Academy Accreditation - Generative AI Fundamentals - Databricks
Python Data Structures - University of Michigan
Part 107 UAS Remote Pilot License - Federal Aviation Administration (FAA)

certificationDetails.name: Certified AI Engineer for Developers Associate

proofBullets: Business Analyst III, TEKsystems at Cisco (Sep 2025 - Present) delivering analytics and measurement support.
Data Engineer at Peraton (Sep 2024 - Sep 2025) building production data pipelines.
Hands-on delivery across SQL, Python, dbt, ETL/ELT, Gen AI, Git.
